name: Crepusculum
description:
A narrative-heavy kite-flying game set on a remote research outpost.  Or at least the beginnings of such a game.

Credits:

Code: petet

Art: Xan Drake

Narrative, Sound, and Music: august søren

Controls: Use the arrow keys to move, and either [Space] or [Enter] to advance dialogue.

Gamepad Controls: Use the left stick to move, and [A] to advance dialogue.  To fly the kite, use the left and right triggers.
